![](https://qovic.com/images/logo.png)

Our Payment Gateway Allocator is a module that not only helps you restrict payment gateways to specific countries but also by placing minimum order amount criteria. This way you're making sure that customers aren't worried if a particular gateway is compatible with their country or not and proceed to order conveniently.

> Features

* Set country and minimum order amount restrictions
* Supports all payment gateways
* Works indefinitely with no restriction to ordering pattern i.e addons / main product

> Requirements

* Supports all countries
* Supports PHP 5.6 and above
* Supports WHMCS V7 (tested) 

[Click Here To Order](https://qovic.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=5)
